title: POCO X4 Pro Hands-On: Main camera and display punch way above its €299 price
content:
Xiaomi is known for many things, but two that are frequent points of discussion here at XDA are “Xiaomi makes the best bang-for-dollar value of anyone” and “Xiaomi’s constant rebranding of existing phones for release under another name is annoying and confusing.” On day one of the Mobile World Congress, the Beijing-headquartered tech giant once

The post POCO X4 Pro Hands-On: Main camera and display punch way above its €299 price appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The POCO X4 Pro has a display and main camera performance that can stand well against phones twice its price range. Check out our hands-on!
